document_data.name: House Despana
document_data.mainbody: '''House Despana''' was a [[drow]] noble house which was spread across many drow cities. One was located in the [[Vhaeraun]]-dominated [[Rilauven]] in the north, another was based in the devoutly [[Lolth]]-worshiping [[Ust Natha]] further to the south. A third section of the family was a minor house of [[Menzoberranzan]].

Organization.Rilauven branch: The most influential member of this branch was [[Malavon Despana]], who was also a talented [[wizard]] and archmage of Rilauven. Unlike most drow, many of this branch believed in egalitarianism.
Organization.Ust Natha branch: This branch was headed by Matron Mother [[Ardulace Despana|Ardulace]], a powerful drow cleric. The Ust Natha branch employed the typical drow philosophy of female dominance and worship of [[Lolth]]. This branch was known for forming an alliance with [[Irenicus]], who planned on attacking [[Suldanessellar]].

document_data.History: Some members of the House turned against the typical matriarchal society of dark elves, and assumed power in a coup. After this, many of them went on to worship [[Vhaeraun]] instead of [[Lolth]].
document_data.Members:
* [[Malavon Despana]], patron of House Despana, and archmage of Rilauven's magical academy
* [[Ardulace Despana]], matron mother of the house, and a cleric of [[Lolth]]
* [[Ginafae Despana]], sister of [[Malavon Despana]], who was once turned into a drider
* [[Phaere Despana]], daughter of [[Ardulace Despana]]
* [[Ilmryn Despana]], former [[Weapon master]] of House Despana, brother to Malavon
* [[Malfeem Despana]], former [[Weapon master]] of House Despana, father to Malavon
